code: import React,{useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function CreatePost(){const[title,setTitle]=useState("");const[content,setContent]=useState("");const[file,setFile]=useState(null);const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(!title||!content){alert("Title and content are required.");return;}const formData=new FormData();formData.append("title",title);formData.append("content",content);if(file){formData.append("file",file);}const API_BASE_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL;axios.post(`${API_BASE_URL}/api/posts`,formData).then(response=>{console.log("Post created:",response.data);navigate("/");}).catch(error=>{console.error("Error creating post:",error);});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"create-post",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Create a New Post"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Title",value:title,onChange:e=>setTitle(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{placeholder:"Content",value:content,onChange:e=>setContent(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"file",onChange:e=>setFile(e.target.files[0])}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Create Post"})]})]});}export default CreatePost;
